name: Pimp my Fusée
description:
This game has been made in two days during the E-artGameJam.

----------------------------------------------------
>Build your space rocket
>Press the Launch button
>Watch it break into pieces
>Abort the mission
>Try again to go as far as you can! 
#GoToTheMoon
----------------------------------------------------
